metadata.synopsis: Wordless AD interaction with the mute, weaker Death Knights supporting the main Death Knight in the Murder Tribunal foyer.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use "oe MT_RandomHand"- Go to the Murder Tribunal Death Knights, get spotted by the main Death Knight- Offer him the hand, end the dialogue- Talk to the other Death Knights.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *In its silence, you feel your own thoughts falter. Its presence alone seems to draw the warmth from your bones. *

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Its breath is dank and coarse, but it has no words. This creature is mute.*
